sdc.title: Fire in the Hole (New Version)
sdc.description: A reimagined version of the classic indoor coaster with advanced effects and storytelling.

sdc.title: Fire in the Hole (Original)
sdc.description: The original version of this iconic ride closed after more than 50 years of operation.

sdc.title: Mystic River Falls
sdc.description: A high-tech river rapids ride featuring the tallest raft drop in the Western Hemisphere.

sdc.title: Lost River of the Ozarks
sdc.description: A popular river rapids ride that was removed to make way for Mystic River Falls.

sdc.title: Time Traveler
sdc.description: A record-breaking spinning coaster with launches and inversions through mountainous terrain.

sdc.title: Outlaw Run
sdc.description: An intense wooden coaster with multiple inversions and steep drops, themed to the Wild West.

sdc.title: WildFire
sdc.description: A steel coaster with five inversions and sweeping views of the Ozark Mountains.

sdc.title: Fireman's Landing
sdc.description: A family-themed area with 10 attractions inspired by 1880s fire-fighting lore.
